General.Name: Maxcom SA
General.Description: Maxcom S.A. engages in the production and distribution of consumer electronics. The company offers navigation GPS, ergonomic phone with traditional keypads, classic phones, rugged waterproof phones, smartphones, desktop phones for sim card, fixed phones, accessories GSM, earphones, smart bands and smartwatches, laptops, sport accessories, led lighting, wireless speakers, robot vacuumss, PMRs, pizza ovens, dvb-t2 receivers, baby monitors, rubbee, phones with a ukrainian keyboards, outlet, and photovoltaics, as well as watches and sports bands, electric scooters, cleaning robots, LED lamps, and smart home. It provides its products under Boviet Solar, Daikin, FoxESS, Gram Box, Haier, Hisense, Isola, Jlab, Lenovo, Maxcom, Motorola, Meizu, Nilox, Maxcom Med, and Viessmann brand names. Maxcom S.A. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Tychy, Poland.
